Documents.Document:
To insert Bible text in this "document":
- click inside the document at the location where you want the text to appear - type the Bible book name in the "Find Verse" box exactly as it appears in the list below (or select the Bible book from the list) - add the chapter and verse after the book name, in the format c:v where c = chapter number and v = verse number - press [Enter] to insert the verse
- Instead of a verse number, a verse range can be used. Ex: "John 1:1-12"
